meta.name: win_system
meta.description: Dashboard for the telegraf input plug-in: win_perf_counters
meta.author: influxdata

queries.query: SELECT mean("Percent_Processor_Time") AS "percent_processor_time" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."win_cpu" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("Available_Bytes") AS "available_bytes" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."win_mem" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("Bytes_Sent_persec") AS "bytes_sent" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."win_net" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("Bytes_Received_persec") AS "bytes_received" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."win_net" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("Processor_Queue_Length") AS "load" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."win_system" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
